content.value: public required AppDomainOption AppDomain { get; set; }

children.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether the tests will be discovered and run in a separate app domain.

content.value: public required XunitProjectAssembly Assembly { get; set; }

children.summary: Gets information about the assembly being discovered.

content.value: public required ITestFrameworkDiscoveryOptions DiscoveryOptions { get; set; }

children.summary: Gets the options that will be used during discovery.

content.value: public required bool ShadowCopy { get; set; }

children.summary: Gets a flag which indicates whether shadow copies are being used. If app domains are not enabled, then this value is ignored.

return.description: Returns the object in JSON form, if possible; returns null if the object cannot be represented in JSON form.

children.summary: Converts the given object to JSON.

summary: Reports that runner is about to start discovery for a test assembly. This message will arrive before the test framework's message, and contains the project metadata associated with the discovery.
remarks: This message does not support serialization or deserialization.

content.value: Public Class TestAssemblyDiscoveryStarting Implements IMessageSinkMessage, IJsonSerializable

specName.value: DispatchWhen(Of TMessage)(, MessageHandler(Of TMessage))
